name: Development Cycle Meta-Router V1

stages.name: Request Classification
stages.description: Classify user request as bug fix, feature request, refactor, or question

decisions.description: Request is a simple code modification

stages.name: Bug Fix Pipeline
stages.description: Execute bug-fix-v1 pipeline for bug fixes

stages.name: Quick Code Change
stages.description: Handle simple, direct code modifications (1-5 lines)

stages.name: Feature Development Pipeline
stages.description: Execute feature-development-v1 pipeline for new features

stages.name: Handle Question
stages.description: Answer user questions about code or system

connections.description: Bug detected, route to bug-fix pipeline
Simple change requested, use direct code implementer
Feature requested, route to feature-development pipeline
Bug fix pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS
Feature development pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS

userContext: There is a bug in the ship fitting UI. When the user double-clicks an item in their inventory to auto-fit it, they get two errors: 1) 'Quantum Universe error: Script error.' at QuantumUniverseIntegration.js:715, and 2) 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'hull')' at StationUI.js:1605 in the autoFitItem function (called from line 1450). The error suggests that something is undefined when trying to access its 'hull' property during the auto-fit operation. Please investigate the autoFitItem function in StationUI.js, identify what object is undefined when accessing the 'hull' property, fix the bug to handle this case properly, create a reproduction script to verify the fix, and test that double-clicking inventory items to auto-fit them now works without errors.

results.classify_request:
```json
{
  "classification": "BUG_FIX",
  "confidence": 0.98,
  "reasoning": "This is clearly a bug fix request. The user reports specific errors occurring in the ship fitting UI when double-clicking inventory items. Key indicators include: explicit mention of 'bug', specific error messages ('Cannot read properties of undefined'), exact file locations (StationUI.js:1605, QuantumUniverseIntegration.js:715), and a broken feature (auto-fit not working). The request includes investigation, fixing, and testing steps typical of bug resolution.",
  "context": {
    "originalRequest": "There is a bug in the ship fitting UI. When the user double-clicks an item in their inventory to auto-fit it, they get two errors: 1) 'Quantum Universe error: Script error.' at QuantumUniverseIntegration.js:715, and 2) 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'hull')' at StationUI.js:1605 in the autoFitItem function (called from line 1450). The error suggests that something is undefined when trying to access its 'hull' property during the auto-fit operation. Please investigate the autoFitItem function in StationUI.js, identify what object is undefined when accessing the 'hull' property, fix the bug to handle this case properly, create a reproduction script to verify the fix, and test that double-clicking inventory items to auto-fit them now works without errors.",
    "keyIndicators": [

    ],
```

DECISION: BUG_FIX
